name: The Last Swing (Gdevelop Mobile #2 Game Jam)
name_original: The Last Swing (Gdevelop Mobile #2 Game Jam)
description:
The Last Swing This is a Game made for the Gdevelop Mobile #2 Game Jam

Its been made in 48 hours!

Liluo: https://liluo.io/lenny230809/the-last-swing

You play as a Ball trying to be the one with the highest Score. Submit your Score to the Leaderboard and be the first!

Buy awesome Skins. Play with your friends in the Multiplayer Mode! Try Disturbing them by giving them a little boost!

Get Boostet by the Power Ups ingame and avoid the evil Ghost trying to stop you!
